game_description: Apple Climbers (previously named Apple Runners), is a HBL (Hand Based Locomotion) game featuring the wonderful fruit, apples! I'm sure you probably already know this, but in order to move, you must use your hands, that's right, no moving around with the stick. Here, you can play a series of gamemodes including Freerun, Dungeon, and more! Or, equip some snazzy cosmetics to personalize your character! The "Main Map", features many things to do! You can mess around with other Apples, go into the Closet (aka. Shop), or visit Mt. Ice! "Grapple", features a prototype-like land, where you can swing around and discover an, interesting secret... "Freerun" is a speedrun-like gamemode, where you start from the bottom, and run to the top! "Dungeon" is a creepy, dark, and scary place. And in there, you REDACTED Expect more modes to come! And have fun! DISCLAIMER: ========== This product is not affiliated with Gorilla Tag or Another Axiom LLC and is not endorsed or otherwise sponsored by Another Axiom LLC. Portions of the materials contained herein are property of Another Axiom LLC. ©2021 Another Axiom LLC.
review_1: Scroll down more. A little bit more. Almost there Here is a quiz What’s 9+10 A. 21 B. 19 Here’s the apple 🍎 🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🍎🏆🏆🏆🏆
review_3: I first got this game cuz some random kid in gtag said he “made the Apple” so I got the game and didn’t play it until 3 months after I got it. When I played it I got really invested and decided to get discord and join their server. And it was a BLAST! Not only do I recommend this game, I also recommend joining their discord because it’s A LOT of fun!
review_4: My favorite part is where I can interact with people and have a good time with them❤️🧡💛💚💙💜💖🤍🤎🖤❤️‍🔥❣️❤️‍🔥￼
